summary: Transformers One is an American animated science fiction action film that came out in 2024. It's based on the popular Transformers toy line by Hasbro and explores the origins of Optimus Prime and Megatron on their home planet, Cybertron. With a star-studded voice cast, the film was directed by Josh Cooley and features a story by Andrew Barrer and Gabriel Ferrari. It premiered in Sydney, Australia, and was released in the US by Paramount Pictures, receiving positive reviews for its story, humor, and animation.
title: Transformers One
